song.title: Nemesis the Doorlock
song.info:
Confide in me: I am the warlock that sets you free, Free from disguise, Gaze on the city and the television skies.
Tell all the people that you say Follow me down, follow me down, Purity Brown. Down on the ground, I know your (??? moods, moves?) I know (??? you're mine, your mind?)
Tom√°s de Torquemada Will ??? na-na-na-nada As long as Sister Stern is sure, Is sure that he's impure.
Confide in me: I am the warlock that sets you free, Free from disguise, Gaze on the city and the television skies.
